Summary: White, sting-ray like shape, was discovered on ground and ascended upon encounter, hovered, descended
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sofia
There were no other sightings in Sofia on or around January 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWas discovered on the ground in a burned wooded area. Upon encounter the object suddenly ascended, hovered, descended, hovered, turned around to reveal a mouth like opening, and kept mobile about 40 seconds. Witness was about 3 feet away. I have a video of 40 seconds.
